title: AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist I Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bathinda (AIIMS Bathinda) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Research Scientist I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BDS and MDS can apply for the AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
